Package be.kdg.processor.user.controllers.rest

Class UserRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.kdg.processor.user.controllers.rest.UserRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/user")
public class UserRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest controller for Camera package. Mapped to listen to requests on /api/user
    Author:
    Cédric Goffin

        @Autowired
public UserRestController​(UserService userService,
                          org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper)
        Constructor for UserRestController.
        Parameters:
        userService - is the service for the User package
        modelMapper - is a mapper that most methods use to map an object to DTO and vice versa

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getUser​(@RequestParam("username")
                                                       java.lang.String username)
                                                throws UserException
        Method that handles incoming GET requests from /api/user.
        Parameters:
        username - a string containing the username
        Returns:
        a SafeUSerDTO with the information about the user (no password)
        Throws:
        UserException - when a user with the supplied username could not be found

      • addUser

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addUser​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                       @Valid UserDTO userDTO)
                                                throws UserException
        Method that handles incoming POST requests from /api/user.
        Parameters:
        userDTO - a DTO containing information about a User
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity with the status code
        Throws:
        UserException - when a user with the same username already exists

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateUser​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                          @Valid UserDTO userDTO)
                                                   throws UserException
        Method that handles incoming PUT requests from /api/user.
        Parameters:
        userDTO - a DTO containing updated information about a User
        Returns:
        a SafeUSerDTO with the updated information about the user (no password)
        Throws:
        UserException - when a user with the supplied username could not be found

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteUser​(@RequestParam("username")
                                                          java.lang.String username)
                                                   throws UserException
        Method that handles incoming DELETE requests from /api/user.
        Parameters:
        username - a string containing the username of the User that needs to be deleted
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity with the status code
        Throws:
        UserException - when a user with the supplied username could not be found
